title: Kirron Kher Being A Goofy Backbencher In The Parliament Is The Best Thing You'll See Today
text:
Kirron Kher Being A Goofy Backbencher In The Parliament Is The Best Thing You'll See Today

Kirron Kher Being A Goofy Backbencher In The Parliament Is The Best Thing You'll See Today

If you have watched debates in the Indian Parliament, you know that our MPs can make the House look like a circus. From people falling asleep to flying paper planes, antics are common in the house.

For the uninitiated, during the ongoing Winter session in Lok Sabha, the government on Wednesday introduced the Constitution (One Hundred and Twenty-Fourth Amendment) Bill, 2019, in the Lok Sabha.

The discussion was about the upper caste bill that seeks to provide 10% reservations in aided and unaided institutions to the economically backward from upper castes. The bill was passed 323-3 in the Lok Sabha on Tuesday.

But in the midst of the heated discussion, was Chandigarh MP Kirron Kher's priceless reaction.

Watch the video at 55:17.

Soon after her question on the steps taken to enhance state force, Kher is seen getting back to her seat and showing off something that looks like a new saree.

description: While the Lok Sabha members were going full throttle over the upper caste bill debate in the Parliament winter session, the one thing that caught people's attention in the live feed is Kirron Kher's goofy mood. In the gif that lasts a few seconds, Kher can be seen showing off a stole or a saree and looking perfectly happy.
